## ContainerConfiguration.responsibleForOwnerRequests property

Indicates whether this container should resolve dependencies that are directly made by its owner. The default is "false" which results in the parent container being used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
responsibleForOwnerRequests: boolean;
```
